Name: That's Pretty Clever
About the game: 'That's Pretty Clever' is a fast but smart dice game for clever players of all ages. The dice want to be chosen quite clever here. Cause good choices can lead to tricky chain reactions to fill more than one field at a time. Each selected dice entered in the color-matched area which will provide victory points at the end of the game. But beware: who is too greedy and chooses the highest dice early, loses valuable moves. Collect achievements for special performances! Place in the highscore list! Hunt the highscore and compete against the worldwide community! The new hit from the 'klein & fein' series. Nominated for Connoisseur's Game of the Year Inlcudes the exclusive 'Challenge 2' extension! Try another challenging setup not available anywhere else.
